# Xchatbots

> Directory of NSFW AI chatbots and virtual girlfriends at x-chatbots.com

## What we offer
- Curated reviews of 48+ NSFW AI tools
- Categories: Virtual Girlfriend, Image Generation, Video Generation, Roleplay, Chat
- Ratings, pricing comparisons, and feature breakdowns
- Blog with comparisons, how-to guides, and news

## Top tools we review
- CandyAI - Video generation, realistic AI girlfriends, voice messages
- SpicyChat - Millions of community characters, built-in image generation
- CrushOn.ai - Uncensored roleplay, no filter NSFW chat
- Promptchan - NSFW image and video generation
- JuicyChat - Anime-style characters, Janitor AI alternative
- Xotic AI - Photorealistic companions, voice calls

## Categories
- /virtual-girlfriend - AI girlfriend and companion apps
- /nsfw-image-generation - AI nude and NSFW image generators
- /nsfw-video-generation - AI video and deepfake tools
- /roleplay - Roleplay and scenario-based chatbots
- /nsfw-chat - Uncensored chat platforms

## Blog
- /blog - Expert comparisons, guides, and industry news
- /blog/candy-ai-vs-spicychat - CandyAI vs SpicyChat comparison
